settings.editor: Jason is a free Elementor layout template that you can use as a personal landing page for your freelance services.

settings.editor: In online marketing, a landing page, sometimes known as a "lead capture page" or a "lander", or a "destination page", is a single web page that appears in response to clicking on a search engine optimized search result or an online advertisement.

settings.title: Have a project in the works?

settings.testimonial_content:
I’ve been trying for months to find a way to build landing pages and sites quickly but customized, without having to sign on to some packaged software solution that makes things easy but predictable, and limited.

Save yourself the time and aggravation – just install Elementor and start loving your new page creating freedom.

tabs.tab_title: Can I use this layout for my site?
tabs.tab_content: Definitely, feel free to use it and modify it as you see fit, in personal or commercial projects. No attribution is required, but appreciated.

tabs.tab_title: What do I need in order to set it up
tabs.tab_content: You will need Elementor page builder, a WordPress installation and any WordPress theme. I use GeneratePress in this demo.

tabs.tab_title: I want to turn this layout into a full website
tabs.tab_content:
Please get in touch with me to discuss your project needs and define a theme, plugin, and hosting configuration.

I will be happy to help you achieve more with your online presence.

settings.editor: If you have the Pro Version of Elementor, you can make use of this Pro Contact frm widget. Otherwise, you may easily use your favourite plugin and embed a form via a shortcode.
